titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to the treatment under section 351(k)(7) of such Act (relating to exclusivity for reference products) of certain products deemed to have a biological product license pursuant to section 7002 of the Biologics Price Competition and Innovation Act of 2009.
Protecting Access to Biosimilars Act of 2019
Protecting Access to Biosimilars Act of 2019
Protecting Access to Biosimilars Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation
